summary: This is an amendment to Jeffrey Epstein's 2001 Trust Two, dated February 4, 2008. It modifies a beneficiary designation, removing one individual and adding Lawrence Visoski to receive a $1,000,000 distribution. The document is signed by Epstein and acknowledged by trustees Darren K. Indyke and Lawrence Newman.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The grantor of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two who is executing this amendment to change a beneficiary.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Added as a beneficiary to receive One Million Dollars ($1,000,000) from the trust, replacing a previous beneficiary.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: One of the trustees who acknowledges receipt of the executed amendment to the trust.

persons.name: Lawrence Newman
persons.context: One of the trustees who acknowledges receipt of the executed amendment to the trust.

connections.description: Epstein amended his trust to designate Visoski as a beneficiary for a $1,000,000 distribution.
Epstein, as grantor, executed a trust amendment which was acknowledged by trustee Indyke.
Epstein, as grantor, executed a trust amendment which was acknowledged by trustee Newman.
Both individuals are listed as trustees of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two.

events.title: Amendment to Epstein's 2001 Trust Two
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein executed an amendment to his 'Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two,' changing a beneficiary to Lawrence Visoski for a $1,000,000 distribution.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein amended his 'Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two' on February 4, 2008.
The amendment designated Lawrence Visoski as a beneficiary to receive One Million Dollars ($1,000,000).
The amendment replaced a previous, unnamed beneficiary under Article FIRST (b) (v) of the trust.
The document was acknowledged by trustees Darren K. Indyke and Lawrence Newman.
This document shows Epstein making significant financial arrangements involving his associates in 2008.
